attributes.action: revise the mileage rates when using public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The mileage allowance for public transport is currently at 23p/mile (compared to 43p/mile for cars) set back in 2002. With bus fares currently at over 50p/mile (and increasing!), we would like to appeal for a revision (and increase) in the public transport mileage allowance.
